data_details.label: Working memory
data_details.docstring: All the facts in the working memory of current step

data_details.label: Fired rules from start
data_details.docstring: Rules fired since the beginning of the process in sequence

data_details.label: Goals/Subgoals
data_details.docstring: Goal and subgoals (with their respective rule) until this step. Achieved subgoals should be removed

data_details.label: Remark
data_details.docstring: Can be used for any additional explanation

data:
Rule 1 is fired because A and B is in the working memory. K is added to the working memory. 

(Q is part of the initial memory)
Rule 7 is fired because K and Q are in the working memory. W is added to the working memory.
Rule 10 is fired because G is in the working memory. R is now added to the working memory.
Rule 4 is fired because Q and R is in the working memory. H is added to the working memory.
Rule 3 is fired because W and H is in the working memory. C is added to the working memory.
No rules can be fired anymore. Therefore, the final decision for this forward-chaining process is C.
